title: Service ducts shall be enclosed by walls having a fire resistance of not less than two hours
clause_text: Service ducts shall be enclosed by walls having a fire resistance of not less than two hours. Doors for inspection or access shall also have a fire resistance of not less than two hours.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Service ducts shall be enclosed by walls having a fire resistance of not less than two hours. Doors for inspection or access shall also have a fire resistance of not less than two hours.
